BugInstance.message: Method org.apache.shardingsphere.readwritesplitting.algorithm.loadbalance.WeightReadQueryLoadBalanceAlgorithm.getWeightValue(String) throws alternative exception from catch block without history
Method org.apache.shardingsphere.readwritesplitting.algorithm.loadbalance.WeightReadQueryLoadBalanceAlgorithm.getDataSource(String, String, List) checks a map with containsKey(), before using get()

org.apache.shardingsphere.readwritesplitting.algorithm.loadbalance.WeightReadQueryLoadBalanceAlgorithm.getWeights(List): 1st parameter 'readDataSourceNames' could be declared as java.util.Collection instead
Class org.apache.shardingsphere.readwritesplitting.exception.algorithm.InvalidReadDatabaseWeightException defines a computed serialVersionUID that doesn't equate to the calculated value
Class org.apache.shardingsphere.readwritesplitting.exception.algorithm.MissingRequiredReadDatabaseWeightException defines a computed serialVersionUID that doesn't equate to the calculated value
Class org.apache.shardingsphere.readwritesplitting.exception.checker.DataSourceNameExistedException defines a computed serialVersionUID that doesn't equate to the calculated value
Class org.apache.shardingsphere.readwritesplitting.exception.checker.DuplicateDataSourceException defines a computed serialVersionUID that doesn't equate to the calculated value
Class org.apache.shardingsphere.readwritesplitting.exception.checker.LoadBalancerAlgorithmNotFoundException defines a computed serialVersionUID that doesn't equate to the calculated value
Class org.apache.shardingsphere.readwritesplitting.exception.checker.MissingRequiredDataSourceNameException defines a computed serialVersionUID that doesn't equate to the calculated value
Class org.apache.shardingsphere.readwritesplitting.exception.checker.MissingRequiredReadDataSourceNamesException defines a computed serialVersionUID that doesn't equate to the calculated value
Class org.apache.shardingsphere.readwritesplitting.exception.checker.MissingRequiredWriteDataSourceNameException defines a computed serialVersionUID that doesn't equate to the calculated value

org.apache.shardingsphere.readwritesplitting.rule.ReadwriteSplittingRule.createStaticDataSourceRuleConfiguration(ReadwriteSplittingDataSourceRuleConfiguration, int, List, List, List): 5th parameter 'readDatasourceNames' could be declared as java.util.Collection instead
Method org.apache.shardingsphere.readwritesplitting.rule.ReadwriteSplittingRule.getDataSourceMapper() does not presize the allocation of a collection
This method org.apache.shardingsphere.readwritesplitting.rule.ReadwriteSplittingRule.createLoadBalancers(ReadwriteSplittingRuleConfiguration) uses a concatenated String as a map key

Static or private method org.apache.shardingsphere.readwritesplitting.rule.ReadwriteSplittingRule.createDataSourceRules(ReadwriteSplittingDataSourceRuleConfiguration, Collection) has unused parameters

Method org.apache.shardingsphere.readwritesplitting.yaml.swapper.YamlReadwriteSplittingRuleConfigurationSwapper.swapToObject(YamlReadwriteSplittingRuleConfiguration) calls size() on a sub collection of a Map
